Module com.example.zad6labv2

Class ColorBoard

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
com.example.zad6labv2.ColorBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ColorBoard extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
A container which extends GridPane with added support for multithreaded Cells.

    Methods inherited from interface javafx.css.Styleable

    getStyleableNode

  • Field Details

    • colorsArray

      public AtomicReferenceArray<javafx.scene.paint.Color> colorsArray
      A variable holding information about current color values in the grid. It is constantly accessed by all the cells and therefore atomic.

  • Method Details

    • getNeighbourColors

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getNeighbourColors(int gridX, int gridY)
      A method which returns average color of the four neighbours of a cell on the grid.
      Parameters:
      gridX - x position of the cell in the grid
      gridY - y position of the cell in the grid

    • SetAnchorPaneLayout

      public void SetAnchorPaneLayout(Boolean Top, Boolean Left, Boolean Bottom, Boolean Right)
      A helper method which sets the layout of ColorBoard in the anchor pane.
      Parameters:
      Top - Boolean which decides whether the ColorBoard should be clipped to the top in an anchor pane layout.
      Left - Boolean which decides whether the ColorBoard should be clipped * to the left in an anchor pane layout.
      Bottom - Boolean which decides whether the ColorBoard should be clipped * to the bottom in an anchor pane layout.
      Right - Boolean which decides whether the ColorBoard should be clipped * to the right in an anchor pane layout.

    • get

      public Cell get(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - x position of the Cell in the grid.
      y - y position of the Cell in the grid.
      Returns:
      Cell at position (x,y)

    • getProbability

      public double getProbability()
      Returns:
      the probability with which the Cells change their color value to the average of their four neighbours.

    • getChangeSpeed

      public int getChangeSpeed()
      Returns:
      the speed with which the Cells change their color in milliseconds, that value is then randomly multiplied by a value from interval [0.5,1.5].

    • getGridWidth

      public int getGridWidth()
      Returns:
      the width of the grid.

    • getGridHeight

      public int getGridHeight()
      Returns:
      the height of the grid.

    • getRandomColor

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color getRandomColor()
      Returns:
      random Color
